title: COVID: Sri Lanka confirms 1,150 new cases and 31 deaths
content: The Director General of Health Services has confirmed another 31 coronavirus related deaths for February 12, pushing the countryâ€™s death toll due to the virus to 15,808.The deaths reported today include 20 males and 11 female patients while two of the victims are below the age of 30 years.Eight of the deceased are between the ages 30-59 years while the remaining 21 are aged 60 years and above.
